trends: There have been no other sightings in Clichy
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was having cigarette on balcony in Clichy iin the evening and saw an UFO fly from the NE to SW appx. Was similar in size to a Boeing 777. I was scanning the sky and heard a noise so I had noticed it. My feelings were elated at the time. I lost sight due to the fact I was done smoking my cigarette and returned inside.
Summary: Watched object go from NE to SW and ascend into clouds rapidly
